Table of Contents

Class MonteCarloForwardSolver

Namespace
Vts.Modeling.ForwardSolvers
Assembly
Vts.dll

Forward solver based on the Scaled Monte Carlo approach, proposed by Kienle and Patterson, used to evaluate the reflectance of a semi-infinite homogenous medium with g = 0.8 and n = 1.4.

public class MonteCarloForwardSolver : ForwardSolverBase, INotifyPropertyChangedPlus, IForwardSolver, INotifyPropertyChanged
